Uses of Class
ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks.PngChunkTRNS

  • Packages that use PngChunkTRNS 
    Package Description
    ar.com.hjg.pngj
    PNGJ main package
    ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks
    Contains the code related to chunk management for the PNGJ library.

    • Uses of PngChunkTRNS in ar.com.hjg.pngj

      Methods in ar.com.hjg.pngj with parameters of type PngChunkTRNS 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int[] ImageLineHelper.convert2rgba(IImageLineArray line, PngChunkPLTE pal, PngChunkTRNS trns, int[] buf)
      this is not very efficient, only for tests and troubleshooting
      static int[] ImageLineHelper.palette2rgb(ImageLineInt line, PngChunkPLTE pal, PngChunkTRNS trns, int[] buf)
      Given an indexed line with a palette, unpacks as a RGB array, or RGBA if a non nul PngChunkTRNS chunk is passed
      static int[] ImageLineHelper.palette2rgba(ImageLineInt line, PngChunkPLTE pal, PngChunkTRNS trns, int[] buf)
      Same as palette2rgbx , but returns rgba always, even if trns is null

    • Uses of PngChunkTRNS in ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks

      Methods in ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks that return PngChunkTRNS 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PngChunkTRNS PngMetadata.createTRNSChunk()
      Creates a new empty TRNS chunk, queues it for write and return it to the caller, who should fill its entries
      PngChunkTRNS PngMetadata.getTRNS()
      Returns the TRNS chunk, if present
